meanings.definition: A sweet, creamy topping for cakes or pastries.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed various frostings for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent2: I love how the frostings make the cupcakes look so pretty.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to sneak a taste of the frostings before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the frostings on the birthday cake.
meanings.sent5: The colorful frostings on the donuts tempted everyone at the office.

meanings.definition: The act of covering something with a layer of frosting.
meanings.sent1: She carefully applied the frostings to the freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent2: The frostings on the wedding cake were beautifully done.
meanings.sent3: The cat left tiny paw prints in the frostings on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The snowfall outside looked like nature's delicate frostings on the trees.
meanings.sent5: The chef's expertise showed in the perfectly smooth frostings on the dessert.
